title: Baked Chicken Caesar Pizza
directions: Mix chicken with spices and some Parm. Separate into 2 even balls. Flatten as much as you can on a silicon matted baking tray to the shape of a circle. Cook in 400 oven for 20-30 min.
Make caesar dressing and dress salad evenly.
Once chicken is cooked serve with salad on top of pizza. Cover with shredded Parm.
